Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem on a train near UIC-Halsted. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem on a train near UIC-Halsted.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
